com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.controller

类 ServiceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.controller.ServiceController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class ServiceController
extends android.app.Service
    ServiceController is a controller and run in Android Service mode

    control PolicyManager, ConnectionManager and ReportManager.
    receive messages from UI and managers
    After user install the application and open the application, the service will run in background

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ServiceController.AccountMessageReceiver
      receiver to receive account complete action message, after finishing handling, it will auto unregister itself
      class  ServiceController.ScreenMessageReceiver
      receiver to receive UI screen action message
      class  ServiceController.UIMessageReceiver
      receiver to receive UI action message
